description:
Gakusanjin is defeated by the child ascetic. Inuyasha and the gang suspect it is Naraku`s doing.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El vínculo entre los dos ¡Hay que usar el fragmento de la Esfera!(1º Parte)
Futari no Kizuna Shikon no Kakera o Tsukae! (Zenpen)
O compromisso do casal para o uso da Jóia (parte 1)
The Bond Between Them, Use the Sacred Jewel Shard! Part 1
Unser beider Bande – Benutz den Juwelensplitter – Teil 1
二人の絆 四魂のかけらを使え! (前編)
